title.rendered: Video: Using Keyboard Shortcuts with multiple monitor setups

content.rendered:
Some tips on using tools like BetterTouchTool and Moom on a Mac to speed up working across multiple monitors.

Also on YouTube

excerpt.rendered: Some tips on using tools like BetterTouchTool and Moom on a Mac to speed up working across multiple monitors.
